Tell me about yourself (in a job interview):
To be or not to be:
Browse the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
Send us your review on Google Play Store.
What is English with Lidia Plus?
How can I use the app?
What are the benefits of using the app?
How can I report bugs or give feedback?
How can I learn more about the app or the developer?
How does the app handle my data privacy and security?
Who owns the music and voice in the audio lessons?
How often are new lessons added to the app?
Who is Lidia Melinte and what is her role in the app?
English with Lidia Plus is an app that helps you learn English by reading or listening to blog posts written by Lidia, an English teacher.
You can use the app without internet connection. You can choose to read the blog posts or play audio instead. You can also adjust the theme and settings according to your preferences.

The app can help you learn English with relaxing and easy to understand lessons for everyone. You can also improve your listening skills by playing audio. The app has adaptive themes and Material-You design for a better user experience.
You can report bugs on GitHub. You can also contact d4rk7355608@gmail.com for support, information, and requests. If you are happy with the app, please rate it 5 stars on Google Play.
You can visit the official website/blog of the app. You can also follow D4rK on various platforms such as Google Developers, XDA, YouTube, DeviantArt, GameJolt, Twitter, and GitHub.

The app does not share any data with third parties. The app may collect some data types such as app info and performance. The data is encrypted in transit but cannot be deleted. You can learn more about how developers declare sharing on Google Play.
Some music from the audio lessons belong to their respective owners and principal voice is from Lidia Melinte.
The app is updated regularly with new lessons and features. You can check the Google Play page for the latest updates or follow D4rK on social media for announcements.
Lidia Melinte, an English teacher, creates the lessons and narrates the audios in the app.

Partea bunÄƒ e cÄƒ orice CEO AgeO manager, orice director, orice angajator, orice meneger de personal, toÈ›i sunt È™i ei oameni, iar noi trebuie sÄƒ avem Ã®n minte sÄƒ le oferim cea mai bunÄƒ versiune a noastrÄƒ. Nu mai este destul sÄƒ spui cÄƒ eÈ™ti onest, hard working, confident, loyal, team player, responsible, sensible, amyrical, nuâ€¦ Acum trebuie s-o arÄƒÈ›i. You have to show them you are responsible, dependable. But how? Pur È™i simplu le rÄƒspunzi cu ceea ce vor sÄƒ audÄƒ la Ã®ntrebarea Tell me about yourself

So, tell me about yourself.

Le spunem povestea vieÈ›ii noastre? So, you want me to tell you the story of my life? No! He does not want to hear you telling him the story of your life. Nu, pentru cÄƒ nu suntem Brad Pitt Ã®n interview cu un vampir. Nu ne Ã®ntreabÄƒ despre viaÈ›a noastrÄƒ.. despre cÄƒÈ›el, despre pÄƒrinÈ›i. It's not about your life story.

Your parents, your background and your dog's name...

No, it's not about this.

What kind of cat do you have. It is not about that. So, when people hear that question they think Oh, let me tell you my life story and 20 minutes into... you had not talk about anything important. So, what they actually asking this? What are you bringing to the table. So, from now on when you hear the question "Tell me about yourself" I want you to make a mental switch. That equals what value could you bring to the company.

What value could you bring to the company. Asta vor sÄƒ audÄƒ. Ce valoare aduci companiei. Ce probleme poÈ›i sÄƒ rezolvi. Problems can you solve to the company. Ce probleme rezolvi pentru companie. Asta este cheia numÄƒrul 1 pe care v-o aduc astÄƒzi The key number one.

Key number tooâ€¦ Is to be your best self. Be yourself, of cure, be authentic but be the best version of yourself. Fii cea mai bunÄƒ versiune a ta la interviu. Probabil È™i Ã®n job, dar mai ales la interview trebuie sÄƒ arÄƒÈ›i asta. De ce te potriveÈ™ti cu ei? Pentru cÄƒ la urma urmei toÈ›i angajatorii vor sÄƒ È™tie douÄƒ lucruri.

1. DacÄƒ poÈ›i sÄƒ-È›i faci treaba bine. Can you do the job well? 
2. EÈ™ti tu alegerea corectÄƒ Ã®n poziÈ›ia respectivÄƒ? Are you the right choice for the position?

Povestea de succes!!!

Povestea de succes, ne putem ajuta de cele 7 cuvinte de putere. VÄƒ voi da acele 7 cuvinte de putere.

Seven power words. Prin aceste cuvinte Ã®i spuneÈ›i Yes I can do the job! I am the right choice. Primul cuvÃ¢nt, I am responsible, or responsibility folosim expresii precum It was my responsibility to do this, cÃ¢nd vorbim de un job trecut. In my last job I colaborated withâ€¦ "Initiative", al treilea cuvÃ¢nt de putere. I took initiative, arÄƒtÄƒ cÄƒ fÄƒceai ceea ce trebuia sÄƒ faci, fÄƒrÄƒ ca nimeni sÄƒ È›i-o cearÄƒ. Okay, it was my initiative to do thisâ€¦ and thatâ€¦, la fel, "initiative" arÄƒtÄƒ cÄƒ de fapt aveai Ã®ncredere Ã®n tine È™i eÈ™ti un bun muncitor. You showself confidence and you are a hardworker for self. Alt cuvÃ¢nt de putere este "a rezolva" resolve. I resolve the situation when something happened. CÃ¢nd ceva s-a Ã®ntÃ¢mplat. I resolve the situation that ant that and that and by doing that. Alt cuvÃ¢nt de putere este "lead". Chiar dacÄƒ nu veÈ›i fi Ã®ntr-o situaÈ›ie de manager sau de leaders, cuvÃ¢ntul "lead" I was leading, este un cuvÃ¢nt de putere. "Result" este un alt cuvÃ¢nt puternic my result was. And example este alt cuvÃ¢nt. Poate vom detalia data viitoare aceste cuvinte. Dar sÄƒ nu uitÄƒm de unde am pornit, de la a fi responsabil. Responsibility. And they told me how to be responsible, logical, practical, not clinical, right? Asta vor sÄƒ audÄƒ. Nu neapÄƒrat sÄƒ spunem prin cuvinte ca noi suntem responsabili, ci cÄƒ ne-am achitat È™i ne achitÄƒm bine de job. I always follow trought wet I say and gonna go. I am dependable. I hold myself accountable. I take responsibility and do what need to be done. Este exact ceea ce vor sÄƒ audÄƒ cÄƒ faci ceea ce trebuie sÄƒ faci. You do what need to be done. If I, dacÄƒ greÈ™eÈ™ti, if I mess up, it's something I always confess up. I confess, marturisesc. I will keep my head up and neber give up. It is my dudy. And responsibility to follow trought. Iar rÄƒspunsul la aceastÄƒ Ã®ntrebare nu ni-l poate da niciun interview. Dar, orice interview ne poate ajuta sÄƒ È™tim cine suntem noi cu adevÄƒrat. È˜i poate Ã®ntr-o zi chiar vom afla.

BineÃ®nÈ›eles putem asculta cÃ¢ntecul optÃ¢nd È™i pentru lyrics, versuri È™i chiar vÄƒ rog sÄƒ faceÈ™i astfel, sÄƒ ascultaÈ›i muzica Ã®mpreunÄƒ cu versurile, astfel ve-È›i Ã®nvÄƒÈ›a atÃ¢t vizual cÃ¢t È™i auditiv, dar subiectul de astÄƒzi este to be, I am, you are, he is, she is. BineÃ®nÈ›eles frumos exemplificat Ã®ntr-un cÃ¢ntecel de Ã®nceput Ã®n Ã®nvÄƒÈ›area limbii engleze.

I am here, eu sunt aici, you are there. È˜i chiar aÈ™a se Ã®ntamplÄƒ, I am here, you are there, in England I'm here, in Romanian you are there, in England. He is happy? Who is happy? Somebody is happy. Cineva este fericit, he is happy. She is sad, altcineva este trist, ea este tristÄƒ, she is sad.

It is burning ceva poate sÄƒ ardÄƒ undeva, nu ne gÃ¢ndim, nu È™tiu, o inimÄƒ, o pÄƒdure, din pÄƒcate. It is burning, it, pentru animale, obiecte, fenomeneâ€¦ It.. It is burning, the world is turing. Toate acestea Ã®n timp ce lumea se Ã®nvÃ¢rte, the world is turning.

Ãn timp ce, we are people, noi suntem oameni, and they are plants, È™i ele sunt plante.

He is blue, she is red, acestea douÄƒ fiind stÄƒri de spirit, verbul to be exprimÄƒ de asemenea stÄƒri de pirit.

DupÄƒ cum am vÄƒzut verbul to be poate exprima È™i stÄƒri de spirit he is blue, she is red. Sunt aceste expresii folosind culorile din limba englezÄƒ, sunt foarte multe expresii care folosesc culorile, care de care mai colorate, flying colors. We like to learning English and finish the leason with flying colors cu succes, nu? White elephant, you know the expression, ceva scump È™i nefolositor. A golden boy, a golden girl. Vreau Ã®nceputul la he is blue, she is red, de la stari de spirit, cineva este trist, el este trist, he is blue, she is red, dar ea este furioasa. Blue, de asemenea este un cuvÃ¢nt care intrÄƒ Ã®n foarte multe expresii. True blue, care Ã®nseamnÄƒ faithful, loial, credincios, once in a blue moon foarte rar, aproape niciodataâ€¦ Once in a blue moon, out at the blue, din senin, Ã®n mod neasteptat, it's rained yesterday in Romania out at the blue. La noi nu ploua, sunt 40 de grade deci ar fi o minune sÄƒ plouÄƒ, chiar È™i in out at the blue pe neaÈ™teptate.

Mai existÄƒ bÄƒieÈ›ii cu ochi albaÈ™trii, blue eyed boy, cu altÄƒ semnificaÈ›ie decÃ¢t cea care stÄƒ Ã®n RomÃ¢nia, bÄƒieÈ›i cu ochii albaÈ™trii. Aici se referÄƒ la oameni privilegiaÈ›i. He's such a blue eyed boy. The manager always treats him as if he's special, deci cineva care primeÈ™te un tratament special.

Mai existÄƒ È™i boys in blue, sÄƒ nu confundÄƒmâ€¦ BÄƒieÈ›ii Ã®n albastru, adicÄƒ Ã®n uniforme folositÄƒ pentru a descrie poliÈ›ia britanicÄƒ datoritÄƒ culorii albastre a uniformei. I saw boys in blue on the street I think everything is OK. Am vÄƒzut poliÈ›ia pe stradÄƒ, cred cÄƒ totul este OK.

Mai existÄƒ È™i expresia blue color worker, muncitorii care presteazÄƒ munca fizicÄƒ, blue color worker, distinct de white color worker, de cei care presteazÄƒ munca la birou. Dar mai existÄƒ È™i pink color, pentru femeile care, sunt secretare sau au munca de asistente, pink color related to jobs and secretarial work. Cu pink, ar fi pink elephants frumoasÄƒ expresie care aratÄƒ cÄƒ existÄƒ o halucinaÈ›ie undeva Ã®n creierul nostru sau pink slip, o metaforÄƒ folositÄƒ pentru atunci cÃ¢nd cineva este concendiat, iar fired to received a pinks slip, n-am vrea sÄƒ se Ã®ntÃ¢mple asta.

Ummm.. cu verde, verde Ã®mi place foarte mult expresia have a green thumb de data aceasta nu am folosit I am, ci am folosit to have, have a green thumb, avea talent pentru grÄƒdinÄƒrit, I think I have a green thumb. I like flowers and I loved plant and take care of them.

Red, pentru exprimarea stÄƒrilor mai puternice. I see red, I become very angry! VÄƒd rosu Ã®naintea ochilor, I see red sau I am in the red. I am in red, I am in depth, Ã®n datorii, am datorii. Red herring, o expresie folositÄƒ pentru ceva care ne distrage atenÈ›ia, something unimportant that distract attention from the real issue. A red herring. I have something important to write but there is the red herring that disturbs me. Ceva care ne distrage. Red tape, birocraÈ›ie, mai ales Ã®n RomÃ¢nia. I had to go to much red tape to open this company.

A new version of the app is available. Click to update!

â€¢ Added an FAQ section to the app.

 â€¢ Added update notifications to inform users of new content and features.

 â€¢ Added welcome back notifications to greet returning users.

 â€¢ Added an exit dialog to confirm the user's intention to leave the app.

 â€¢ Added in-app updates to allow users to easily update the app without going through the Play Store.

 â€¢ Added a new setting for notifications.

 â€¢ Added a scroll view to the "More apps" dialog for easier navigation.

 â€¢ Added app updater dialog and ability to update in background.

 â€¢ Added language support for Bulgarian, French, German, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Spanish, Russian, Swedish, Turkish and Ukrainian.

 â€¢ Enhanced project structure for better readability and maintainability.

 â€¢ Reworked and improved animations.

 â€¢ Fixed all crash reports from Google Play Console and Google Firebase.

 â€¢ Improved readability, consistency, app performance, and responsiveness by optimizing and styling the outdated code.

 â€¢ Made various under-the-hood improvements for a better overall app experience.
